name: Air Flight Pirates: The Sky Plane Hacking Safety Mission
name_original: Air Flight Pirates: The Sky Plane Hacking Safety Mission
description:
WARNING !!! Pirates are trying to hack into your plane, you need to avoid them and save everyone on board. Your destination is a bit far, but your the best pilot, you should be able to be successful ! Collect bit coins along the way to buy safe passage !!

If hacker planes are not enough worries, you just enter a hot air balloon festival, you do not want any casualties so avoid them at all cost. You'll have to navigate your your trough all of this ! If you don't succeed at first no worries, try again and beat your own high score !

DOWNLOAD AIR FLIGHT PIRATES For FREE now !

Any suggestions and/or feedback?
Reach The Craques Potes Family at: family@craquespotes.com
